content: looking for a quick knit this simple pattern is intended for newer knitters who are interested in making their first pair of mittens or for any knitter who would like a speedy project to keep their hands warm please check gauge and use a sturdy yarn if the yarn is soft and the gauge a little too loose the mittens will not be fit for purpose finished measurements sizes small medium large length approximately 8 5 9 5 10 5 circumference approximately 6 75 8 9 materials i skein alafosslopi color #57 grey or #1240 dark magenta or #0118 navy or 1 hank jody long andeamo 85% wool 15% alpaca 7oz 175yds color #10 sunset size 10 6 mm double pointed needles or size to obtain gauge stitch markers 1 removable 1 ring stitch holder or waste yarn gauge 14 stitches and 18 rounds = 4 in stockinette note to ensure a successful project check gauge change needle size as necessary notes be sure to check gauge there are many helpful online tutorials for backward loop cast-on and make one increases
